heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy from the Adirondacks and Rt. 2 north, with any morning snow showers ending.  Becoming partly sunny in the Champlain Valley, and mostly sunny south.  Highs 30 to 40 north to south.  West winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Becoming mostly clear, except periods of clouds from the Green Mountains east, north of Rt. 2.  Patches of low clouds and valley fog late.  Lows in the upper teens to low 20s.  West winds near 10 mph in the evening, diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Morning clouds east of Lake Champlain and north of Rt. 2.  Sunshine west and south, and increasing afternoon sun northeast.  Milder.  Highs in the 30s to near 40 north, 40 to 45 in the Champlain Valley and south.  Light winds, mainly west less than 10 mph.
